entry.title: Test Title
entry.content:
This is some example

The citation is presented inline like this: (a number that displays more information on hover).

There is also some more text afterwards.

Just wrap the text you would like to show up in a footnote in a <d-footnote> tag. The number of the footnote will be automatically generated. 1

Which is not really trueBut actually yes if you look.

There is also some more text afterwards.
